import React from 'react' import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import "./article.css"; import { Publish } from "@material-ui/icons"; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { getArticles } from '../../redux/apiCalls'; export default function Article() { const location = useLocation(); const articleId = location.pathname.split("/")[2]; const article = useSelector((state) => state.article.articles.find((article) => article._id === articleId)); return (

id: {article._id}
